Sentence: She (Oedipa) also hires a philatelist -LRB-stamp expert-RRB- named Genghis Cohen to go through Pierce's stamp collection
After doing so, Genghis tells her (Oedipa) that some of Pierce's stamps have a muted post horn in their watermark
Meanwhile, Genghis Cohen helps her (Oedipa) piece together some mysteries about Pierce's stamp collection, which is to be auctioned off by a local dealer as Lot 49
